summary: Implemented a new SignInPage and set the `/` route to render it. The page passes the exact heading text "Welcome to EOA" and redirects authenticated users to `/profile`. However, the diff does not provide evidence that the `/` page includes a working "Sign In" button that initiates Internet Identity login (it delegates UI/behavior to UnauthSignInScreen, whose implementation is not shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking "Sign In" on the `/` page initiates Internet Identity login.
missing_requirements.reason: The new `/` page renders `UnauthSignInScreen` and does not itself implement or show any sign-in button wiring/callback; without the `UnauthSignInScreen` implementation in the diff summary, there is no direct evidence the button exists and triggers Internet Identity login.
